'''''Other Minds'' 26''' is the twenty-sixth issue of ''[[Other Minds]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and other role playing games set in Middle-earth, published in December 2022.

==Contents==
* "Editorial: Back from the Depths"
** By [[Thomas Morwinsky]]
* "The Road Goes Ever On"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Inside Information"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Learning 'Spells' in Roleplaying Games set in Middle-earth"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "The Rangers of the North"
** By Gabriele Quaglia
* "Review: Ruins of the Lost Realm"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "A New Stronghold"
** By Andreas Erdmann
* "Wild Men of the South"
** By Adam Brown
* "Where in Bree-Land is Combe Valley?"
** By Kris Goldsmith
